article:
Facebook is a famous website. It is _ among young students, especially   college students. They can _  find friends or send photos on the website. They can have lots of fun when they visit Facebook. In all, Facebook is  _  more famous and it has more users.
According to a US newspaper, Facebook may soon  _  children under 13 to visit the site. They can visit the website  _  they are staying with their parents.
At the moment, children under 13 are not allowed to visit Facebook. There are some  _ . One of them is about strangers.  Sometimes strangers may be bad people. If bad people know the children's names, addresses and much personal _ , the children may be in  danger.
But more and more children want to visit Facebook. The company wants to find some ways to keep children  _  when they visit Facebook.  For example, their accounts can be linked with (......) their parents. Parents can  _  their children's friends easily. They may even check their children's chat messages.
